DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate pedometer use by overweight women during pregnancy. The study will show if a pedometer will help women to limit weight gain during pregnancy. It will also show if it there are other benefits such as decreased diabetes, decreased high blood pressure, decreased rates of cesarean section, and decreased complications for the baby.
DOC.brief_title: Pedometer Use to Prevent Excessive Pregnancy Weight Gain in Overweight Women
DOC.criteria: Age 18 years or older Pregnant Less than 16 weeks gestation Body mass index 25 or greater at first prenatal visit History of spontaneous preterm delivery between 2032 weeks gestation Medical contraindication to exercise or walking during pregnancy
